sub_title: Recent International Tourism Management Graduate seeking for a job position in marketing, sales, tour, or hospitality
summary:
I am Kay Karen Abeka and I am 28 years old. I grew up in Accra-Ghana where my interest in tourism management evolved. Furthermore, I had always been interested in geography and the desire to travel and study abroad. It therefore became easier for me to study and live in the Netherlands since my parents are Dutch. 
I graduated  with a bachelor degree of Tourism Management at NHTV, with specialization in International Tourism and Travel Industry (ITTI); and following my minor E-travel where I studied the modules; Online Marketing, Social Media Marketing, SEO audit, E-business audit, Websites and Systems, Customer Engagement Management and Project management.
Consequently, I see myself working in a variety of industries and not only in the tourism sector. Due to my experiences from working in the Retail industry, I believe I can be a sales/marketing manager or customer support analyst as well.  Preferably,  I would like to work on a full time basis and even though I currently live in Rotterdam, I have no problem at all if I have to relocate to an apartment closer to my future work or commune by public transport.

certifications.name: Bachelor of Tourism Management
certifications.authority: NHTV Breda University of Applied Sciences

company.name: NHTV Breda University of Applied Sciences

profile_positions.description:

- Responsible for the development, improvement, and maintenance of standards for the security of Bytedance's online communities.

- Responsible for coordinating with supervising departments for timely management of content that violates Bytedance's policies.
profile_positions.title: Content Moderator

profile_positions.description:
Planning & Organizing
working with created planning from VM supervisor and VM manager
Guiding tasks when support is given by others
Giving suggestion for new week plan with knowledge on availability of products
Implementing new trends and campaigns (Sample, Order & build)
Organizes equipment & POS for the implementation of new trends and campaigns

Communication
Reporting to VM Supervisor
Having Knowledge of all relevant information for their department coming from the VM supervisor
Communicating with VM supervisor if planning cannot be achieved
Communicating with departments on moving, filling and ordering stock
communicating with returns team when support is needed with returning samples
Giving suggestions for new trends or commercial opportunities

Training & Coaching
being a buddy for a new VM colleague
Able to deliver and receive feedback
Coaching retail colleagues on guidelines and procedures 

Monitoring & Controlling
Monitoring all VM principles when moves are done on my department
Monitoring VM principles on retail-oriented campaigns or guidelines on my department
Making Best Practice Photo’s
Doing daily floor checks on mannequins, POS, guidelines and stock availability
profile_positions.title: Visual Merchandiser

profile_positions.description:
•	Opening the deliveries and ensuring that the new lines are put in customer view with their right sizes before the store is opened to increase purchase and boast up customer satisfaction
•	Displaying  similar items together in an attractive way to enhance purchase
•	Knowing the company's bestsellers and ensuring that such items are always displayed in the view of the customers and in their right sizes
•	Taking notes of empty stock and reporting to supervisor or manager to make the order right away
•	Attending to customer needs in the store and also at the cash desk
•	Doing the lineup to ensure that the store looks nice and tidy
•	Doing pickups to avoid causing immerse danger to customers which may incure costs for the company
•	Ensuring that empty arms are replaced with other items or removed immediately to prevent danger to customers
•	If necessary, doing the paperworks to discover which items have been sold, no sale, bestsellers etc to enhance sale.
profile_positions.title: PART-TIME SALES-ASSISTANT PRIMARK UTRECHT

profile_positions.description: •	Taking on diverse job functions such as waitress, barkeeper, wardrobe assistant, sales assistant, promoter, cleaner, and hostess in order to orientate myself for multiple leadership roles.

profile_positions.title: POST WORKER (POSTNL)

profile_positions.description:
•	Creation and management of a new travel webpage for customer acquisition.
•	Represented as a point of contact for the company’s international accommodation suppliers.
•	Created travel itineraries for customers in order to present clients with diverse travel options.
•	Managed the company website as well as the social media channels on a daily basis in order to maintain customer relationship. 
•	Doing desk research on a regular basis to ensure that the company stays updated on current affairs of all the travel destinations which they offer.
•	Responsible for file archiving in order to ensure that everything is organised for easy access.
